Developer Terms of Use
des:
Kleverness works flawlessly with Alexa to implement a complete home control of your Klever Devices (Klever Switch, Klever Dimmer, and Klever outlet).
Once your Kleverness device is verified and linked to your Alexa profile, you can discover your devices by saying, “Alexa, discover my devices” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.

To control your devices, say “Alexa turn on/off my <device name>.” You can also create groups of other ON/OFF devices in the Alexa app to control together.
You — or anyone you decide — can tell Alexa to turn lights on, off, dim them, or turn on/off your devices through a single voice command. Use the Kleverness App to select, update, and rename your preferred devices or scenes for Alexa.
